Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.bcast

Provides broadcast-based physical topology monitor, deprecated in favor of the mcast package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BcastTopologyMonitor Deprecated
    in favor of using a broadcast address with McastTopologyMonitor.

Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.bcast Description

Provides broadcast-based physical topology monitor, deprecated in favor of the mcast package.
